entry.title: New release for Black Candy: v2.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New

  • Add API for user authentication by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/171
  • Fix #124, automatically sync for media library changes by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/179

Improved

  • Minor changes to en.yml strings for readability by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/128
  • Use GlobalID for all Jobs by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/132
  • Search appearance by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/135
  • Upgrade Ruby to 3.1 by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/137
  • CI: Enable caching bundler and and yarn dependencies by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/148
  • Fix #125, put media sync to background job by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/153
  • Refactor Search Frontend by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/136
  • Fix #157 - Replace eslint with standard js by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/168
  • Consolidate Album and Artist image logic into concern by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/172
  • Enhance test by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/176

Fixed

  • Fix #123 - Avoid Unpermitted parameters on Playlists::SongsController by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/146
  • Fix CI ENV typo by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/149
  • Fix #123 - Avoid caching song_id form parameter by @jaredmoody in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/147
  • Fix #158, cannot generate transcode cache on docker build by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/167
  • Fix #154, high CPU usage when playing audio on safari by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/174

New Contributors

  • @jaredmoody made their first contribution in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/pull/128

Full Changelog: https://github.com/blackcandy-org/black_candy/compare/v2.0.1...v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Black Candy: v3.0.0
entry.content:
Hi, It's been a long time since the last stable release. Thank you to everyone who tried and gave feedback on the edge version of Black Candy. You helped a lot with this release.

There are a lot of improvements since v2. Most importantly, the official Black Candy mobile apps are finally released with Black Candy v3. You can go to the README to see download options.

If you upgrade from v2 release, please check V3 upgrade guide to upgrade.

If you upgrade from edge release, please check Edge upgrade guide to upgrade to stable v3.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/compare/v2.1.1...v3.0.0

entry.title: New release for Black Candy: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

[!IMPORTANT] Please check the v3.0-v3.1 upgrade guide when you do upgrade.

Breaking change:

  • The default export port changed from 3000 to 80. You need to remap your port after upgrading.

New

  • Parallel media sync by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/pull/389

Improved

  • Upgrade wahwah to 1.6 by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/pull/384
  • Upgrade Rails to 7.2 by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/pull/392
  • Replace Nginx with Thruster to send file by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/pull/398

Fixed

  • Fix volume permissions by @aidewoode in https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/pull/431

Full Changelog: https://github.com/blackcandy-org/blackcandy/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0
